channel.title: WSTG-v42-ATHN-01 on OWASP ZAP
channel.description: Recent content in WSTG-v42-ATHN-01 on OWASP ZAP

item.title: Weak Authentication Method
item.description: HTTP basic or digest authentication has been used over an unsecured connection. The credentials can be read and then reused by someone with access to the network.
